import { useState } from "react" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" export default function Login () { const nav = useNavigate() const [form, setForm] = useState({ email : "", password : ""}) const onFormChange = (e) => { setForm({...form, [e.target.name] : e.target.value }) } const submit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(form) } return (
